EmailTemplate.description: when form is submitted to Reviewer
EmailTemplate.name: Sent for Reviewer
EmailTemplate.subject: Sent for Review
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sent for Review
Dear {!ReviewerName} ,
{!AppraiseeName} sent their Appraisal for Review. Kindly go through it and provide the final rating and feedback/comments for their Appraisal within the corresponding end date{!EndDate}.
Thank & Regards,
KRIYA(PMS)
